comments.comment: Hi! thanks for your contribution!, great first issue!

I can look into this. To summarize, there is a problem when we mix *_epoch_end (new version) and *_end (old naming) for validation and test. There is no problem if we would consequently use only one of the two, either the deprecated or the new way. Is this correct? I propose this fix: <denchmark-code>if test_mode: if is_overriden("test_end"): # get results and warn user elif is_overriden("test_epoch_end"): # get results else: # same as above but with "validation_end", "validation_epoch_end" </denchmark-code>
